column5: Looks like you've been practicing with the Camera Joey. It shows. Fantastic photos and a great report to boot.
Great Report Joey !  Now ... where's all the logo's and Team 4 inches ???
Excellent report!! Some really neat wildlife pics and looks like the fish co-operated!Thanks for sharing.
Great report joey! Really Really nice pictures too!!
I took a pic of all my fish with the OFC Logo but realized I've been out inched in all the categories of our team  Joey
Great report Joey. Looks like you had another awesome trip there again this year. Thanks for posting all the great pics along with the report.  Mike
AS always some great pics!!  It was really good to see you again....  except Paul of course... he keep stealing my well deserved hangovers...
Great report Joey!! To bad I missed you guys this year. Maybe we can get out for some Salmon fishing this summer.
That's a deal for sure Pete, or down to LSC for the day.  We're thinking of going for Salmon tomorrow as a matter of fact  Joey
Sounds like a great week!

Great spending time with you and Paul again Hun !..and as you say some great yaking Monday and Tuesday nights! Thanks for that great shot of my sweetheart on the dock as well!! lol Looks like I need to check into Jenny Craig though in my picture!
Great report Joey   Wayne I noticed, didn't want to bring it up but since your here Leah must not be working ya hard enough
What, and get rid of those fabulous love handles, I don't think so  Where's all your pics hon???  Joey
Looking at my photo's Wayne, I need the XXXL program.....

Got back late yesterday from another fantastic week at Lakair.  We got there early Saturday after Paul got off work too late to drive up Friday night.  By the time he got home and the truck was loaded it was 1:30 a.m. so we decided to get a few hours sleep and we were off by 6 a.m.  Saw a few of these on the way and knew we were close.    We barely had time to set up camp and the pike tournament was starting.  We blasted off behind Irishfield and Spiel to get to our fav pike spot.  Took a pic of these rednecks in a weird coloured boat    Got some shots of some OFNr's while waiting for the fish fry and while prizes were being awarded.  Ladywalleye (Shelley)    Jaden and Monique, and Muskiestudd (Chris) hearing no evil I presume    Greencoachdog (Glen) enjoying what does not look like moonshine, but just regular ordinary rye.    A nice pic of Roy, but unfortunately its a bit out of focus.    A good shot of Beans (Norm)    Dawson (Marty's son) taking home one of many of his prizes.  What a sweetie that little boy is.    Art (Aplumma) leaving the prize table.    Irishfield (Wayne) on his way to the prize table.    Daplumma (Joe), Art and Glen sitting pretty!    TJ and Art having a moment.    Monday Lew and Spiel (Chris) packed up and left us, sniff, sniff.  I enjoyed our almost pickerel fishing Chris    We fished Muskrat Bay and even ventured over to Merganser Bay, and there was alot of active weather.  These kept popping up most days then we'd have some good thunderstorms.  Monday was a doozie that lasted a good 5 hours.    These guys were all over the place,    which eventually turned into our friends........    Saw this little fellow fisherman out on the shores of Muskrat one day    This little guy was very friendly.  Paul even got him to do tricks, as you can see him jumping in the second picture for a peanut.      We also found this little cutie wandering around    Off a fishing we will go....    We caught ALOT of pike.  This guy, I'm happy to say, like my new homemade bucktail.  I had many follows and catches with all my homemade lures.    Caught a bass, while pickerel fishing    This guy went for the perch coloured musky bait    A bass while musky fishing    More pike    I thought this was hilarious.  Paul had put the perch shad rap on the dash and then later his wet bucktail.  On the drive back the bucktail dried and it made the shad rap look like it had a mohawk    I think this place is in need of repair, ha ha.    Can you see the face    more pike        Finally got into some pickerel the last day there.  Some slot sized tho.  But it was a great night to be out in the weather and the mosquitos were not bad that night for some reason.    A mini perch    And our last sunset before heading home the next morning.    Kevin visited us one night and told us that there are these new tree frogs that have started living in the trees.  I tried to get a video so you can hear them and it turned out great, until the end!!!!!!!    Here's another vid of Paul trying to get a campfire to stay lit while it rained like cats and dogs on Monday.    It was a super week and we had some great conversations with Wayne and Leah in their cabin a few wet evenings.  Richard Clemens and his wife Patsy joined us also.  Can't wait to go back up.  On a sad note, Leslie's mother died during the week.  Kevin played Taps on his bugle in memorium.  Leslie did not come back to camp so our sincerest condolances to you Les.  Joey & Paul

....Fabulous pictures Miss Joey. Looks like you guys had some good fishing after we all left yous. As for are "almost pickerel" fishing well it turns out you didn't even catch a little one!  Look at this post to see what I'm talk'n bout.  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=21063

Great reports folks.  I remember passing by each other, in the distance, many a time.   I guess you all didnt' catch Mr. Musky either.  Anyway, we all had a great time.  When did Leslie's mother pass ?   I know she left for Timmins early on Wednesday am and didn't see her later in the day.  We pulled out around 4:30am on Thursday.
Oh, I gotcha Spiel     We'll get em next time for sure, August maybe!!!  Rich, she passed on Thursday  Joey
Great report and pics Joey!!!  Makes me wish I was still up there!!!
Great report Joey... TJ sure does have a thing for the Plummas eh?

Great report Joey and Paul. Sorry to hear about Leslie's Mom. Thanks for the video clips...not YOU Paul. I hope to see you guys soon.  Edit: You think my pic is blurry? You shoulda seen it from MY side!
Thanks for the report Joey & Paul. Looks like the fishing might have improved as the week went on. Sorry to hear about Leslie's Mom.
What that saying,you get better looking with age??????????? Not you Paul.LOL  Great report J.  TFS.
Awesome report Joey looks like ya has some fun but where are the musky pics?

Great report Joey!  Looks like you and Paul had a great week up there.  You mentioned 'almost' fishing with Spiel....I'm impressed you held on while he did circles round and round at full throttle....LOL.  Great seeing you guys as always.
Ya, that was something else eh, I love thrill rides  Was great seeing you two again also.  Glad Carol got the pin out of her propane bottle without blowing up.  That worried me a little  Joey
Great report/fishing trip joey !!!!...awesome pics too,and great fishing too !!!!i hope i get to go to lakair oneday,and have all the fun that you guys did....cheers
Fantastic report Joey, absolutely lovin' the pictures, specially the island with the wind, the Jumping chippy and the mowhawk. Thats a nice size walleye you got there too.
Wonderful report Joey, some really great pictures there.
looks like you guys had a great time
Joey awesome pics! great report
Great report Joey !!! Lots of interesting pictures too.....  Cheers !!
Totally awesome!
Was good to see y'all again.Wish we had some more time to catch from last year.Thanx for taking the time to report. Joe
Very Nice!
Great Pics Joey looks like the weather held out for you cant say the same for me and Brian!! Rained most of our week Glad you cought some fish too WTG Cheers Mike

JoeyNpaul, I could only get as far as Roy's blurred pic ..(computers in our area) .....but the report spoke volumes and I imagined the pics as if I had them......thanks for that.. Really wished Charmaine an I could get back up there this year......serious. Not sure about next year either...but going to make Picton in November. Let Paul know that there is some years gone by I'd like to jam with him about.... Thanks and again......exellent report.
Learn something new everyday...dragon flies are ugly before and after      loved the pics...thanks for putting names with the pics too...Great report
